description: Improved application performance by up to 42x, primarily by optimizing the database insert process
Eliminated locking issues in the multiposting feature by implementing asynchronous processing
Played a key role in the design and development of the MetalPay API, contributing to the implementation of robust and secure endpoints for seamless transactions
Contributed to the development of the Gold to Mecca API, focusing on creating efficient data exchange mechanisms to facilitate gold transactions related to Mecca pilgrimages.
Contributed significantly to the development of the Ziswaf API, streamlining processes for Zakat, Infaq, and Sadaqah transactions with a focus on usability and reliability.

achievements: Led External Relations for Computer Science Student Association
Finalist in Smart Device, Embedded System, and IoT Gemastik XIV 2021

certifications.name: Spring Boot Microservices and Spring Cloud. Build & Deploy.
